prompts: Create a digital Pokemon with a sleek design and a futuristic vibe.
I want a bright, colorful Pokemon that resembles a computer program come to life.
Generate a quirky, playful Pokemon that can float and has a round body shape.
Make a unique Pokemon that embodies the concept of artificial intelligence in its design.
Imagine a Pokemon with a vibrant pink body and blue accents, perfect for tech enthusiasts.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a retro video game character with a modern twist.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that combines elements of technology and nature.
